column4: i just inherited an old hoary server that I need to install a package on. unfortuantely my sources are so out of date they dont exist anymore. anyone know what sources I should be using for hoary?
yeah, i realize i should upgrade it. we are probably just going to retire it soon. i just need to install one package for the time being
Yes, definitely upgrade. Hoary is 5 or 6 I think
